named-query.name: READ_ORDERS_BY_USER_ID
named-query.query: SELECT order FROM org.broadleafcommerce.order.domain.Order order WHERE order.user.id = :userId

named-query.name: READ_ORDER_BASKET_FOR_USER_ID
named-query.query: SELECT basketOrder FROM org.broadleafcommerce.order.domain.BasketOrder basketOrder WHERE basketOrder.user.id = :userId

named-query.name: UPDATE_BASKET_ORER_TO_SUBMITED
named-query.query: UPDATE org.broadleafcommerce.order.domain.Order orderx SET TYPE = 'SUBMITTED' WHERE orderx.id = :id
